file_content.text: Don't try to move. You're dying.
I may have your cure, but I'm not going to lie....
This will hurt.
Agh! Aagh!
That wasn't... quite so bad.
Lana. You saved my life.
It's really you. Thank you.
I spared you from dying this very instant. We still have quite a ways to go.
Lana. Am I glad to see you. Not sure why there are so many of you, but....
You're a sight for sore eyes.
Let's table any thank-yous until I've got you fully recovered and offworld.
My crew, they were slaughtered. And Dromund Kaas, I was there. The Empire was coming apart....
I had a nightmare....
I lost my crew. I tried to save them. And Coruscant... ships bombarded the capital....
What a nightmare....
Some dreams and some visions, no doubt. Best put aside for now.
I'm sure you had many dreams in there. Some were bound to hold an air of truth.
What do you mean?
No time for that now. Gear up.
Who are you?
Do I know you?
Side effects are worse than I thought. I'm Lana Beniko, and I was your ally once. I'm getting you out of here.
Gear up, quickly.
Vault guards = arriving // Lana + Jedi = get ready!
My friend to the rescue.
Great to see you, pal!
Jedi = still in danger! // Everyone = still in danger!
What's happening?
Teeseven? But I saw--
You aren't scrap after all?
What's happening here?
Teeseven! Is Kira here, too? Doc? Where is everyone?
Where are the others?
Teeseven! Is Doc here, too? Kira? Where is everyone?
Where are the others?
Data = insufficient // story = long!
For now, we're all you've got.
Vault guards = arriving // Lana + Barsen'thor = get ready!
Vault guards = arriving // Lana + Major = get ready!
Vault guards = arriving // Lana + Captain = get ready!
Vault guards = arriving // Lana + Sith Lord = get ready!
Vault guards = arriving // Lana + bounty hunter = get ready!
Vault guards = arriving // Lana + Agent = get ready!
Is that a Republic model?
Teeseven Oh-one. He's agreed to help rescue you.
Not a very big crew.
Yes, well, it's the best I could manage. It will have to be enough.
The Empire and Republic have all but fallen to the man who imprisoned you. You're our last hope.
Come on!
